attributes.action: Stop with immediate effect, foreign nationals having the same rights as UK nationals in obtaining training/employment in this country if there are sufficient UK nationals in that profession to fill the posts.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In line with almost all foreign countries, if a foreign national wishes to come here to work or train in a profession subsidised by the UK taxpayer, then the employer (including government bodies) must prove it has insufficient UK nationals to fill the role before allowing a non UK national to fill the vacancy.
